Recently I joined the interdisciplinary Exploring Neuroculture working group at the Jackman Humanities Institute.

Powers talk at Toronto

Can powers actualize? I'll tell you all about it in my talk on November 28 at the University of Toronto.

I have a new post on history in The Philosopher's Annual on the Mod Squad.

My post on modern philosophy's PR problem is now up on The Mod Squad blog.
